title: IT IS AN INSTITUTE WITH HIGHEST SUCCESS RATIO.
description: Our consistently best results prove success of a pedagogy, a well-defined methodology that works every single time with students, our comprehensive teaching methodology sets us way ahead of the traditional school system teaching.

title: ADEQUATE COMPETITIVE ENVIRONMENT AMONG STUDENTS
description: At CMC, we prepare students with subject knowledge as well as the skill to apply it in competitive examinations. To be successful, these components are equally critical and essential.

title: EXHAUSTIVE COURSE CONTENT
description: The academic program at CMCy is rigorous in which we develop problem analysing and solving skills in students which makes even the most arduous problems easy to solve. We create a space for students to explore their subject knowledge to greater depths.
